content.prompt: The excerpt best reflects which of the following historical situations?

choices.label: Congressional leaders sought political compromise to resolve discord between the North and the South.
States in the Great Lakes region advocated to legalize slavery within their borders.
Senators appealed to the idea of American exceptionalism to encourage national unity.
The Supreme Court decision in the Dred Scott case reduced sectional conflict within the United States.

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how a specific historical development or process is situated within a broader historical context.
